name: PlaygroundPage.ExecutionMode
desc: The available speeds for executing the code on a playground page.

items.name: case run
items.desc: An execution mode that runs at the normal speed.

items.name: case runFaster
items.desc: An execution mode that runs more quickly than usual.

items.name: case runFastest
items.desc: An execution mode that runs at the fastest possible speed.

items.name: case step
items.desc: An execution mode that executes code statement by statement.

items.name: case stepSlowly
items.desc: An execution mode that executes code statement by statement with extra pauses between each.

items.name: static func != (PlaygroundPage.ExecutionMode, PlaygroundPage.ExecutionMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns true when the execution modes being compared are different.
